title: Injective Protocol Canonical Chain Upgrade
description:
This is a software upgrade proposal for the upgrade to the canonical Injective Chain. If passed, this proposal would commit the Injective Chain to halting the Injective Canary Chain application binary at approximately 14:00 UTC on Nov 8th and starting the application binary for the Injective Canonical Chain. 

More details can be found in the long form proposal: https://github.com/InjectiveLabs/injective-chain-releases/blob/master/docs/migration/injective-canonical-chain.md
